list.name: Student Service BE
list.description: This is a BE part (done in Spring Boot framework) of the application which contains a data for students, professors, exams, exam periods... Professor can add exam, student can apply to an exam, professor can then insert a grade for students exam.

list.name: Student Service FE
list.description: This is a FE part (done in Angular framework) of the application which contains a data for students, professors, exams, exam periods... Professor can add exam, student can apply to an exam, professor can then insert a grade for students exam.

list.name: Atersir Idrico FE
list.description: FE app for Italian company Atersir Idrico done in Angular using Micro-Frontends. App contains interceptors, custom pipes, custom components...

list.name: AngularJS app for a new company
